Terms & Conditions for OrthoDirection

Welcome to OrthoDirection! By using our platform, you agree to these Terms & Conditions. Please read them carefully before accessing or using our services. If you do not agree, please refrain from using our platform.

1. Definitions

“Platform” refers to the OrthoDirection website and mobile application.
“User” refers to any individual accessing the platform, including Patients and Doctors.
“Patient” refers to individuals seeking dental consultations or services through the platform.
“Doctor” refers to licensed dental professionals registered on the platform.

2. Acceptance of Terms

By registering on OrthoDirection, you confirm:
You are at least 18 years old or have parental/guardian consent to use the platform.
You will provide accurate and complete information during registration and while using the platform.

3. Use of the Platform

For Patients:

You agree to use the platform only for lawful purposes, such as booking appointments, sharing medical records, and communicating with doctors.
You acknowledge that the information provided by doctors is for consultation purposes and should not replace in-person medical treatment unless advised otherwise.

For Doctors:

You confirm that all professional details provided during registration are accurate and updated regularly.
You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of patient data and complying with applicable medical regulations.

Prohibited Activities (For All Users):

Misusing the platform for fraudulent or illegal purposes.
Posting false, defamatory, or harmful content.
Interfering with the platform's functionality or security.

4. Appointments and Services

For Patients:

Appointments are subject to doctor availability. Cancellations or rescheduling must follow the cancellation policy outlined by the platform or doctor.
The platform is not liable for delays, cancellations, or issues arising from consultations.

For Doctors:

Ensure timely management of appointments and proper patient communication.
OrthoDirection reserves the right to remove doctors for violations of these terms or patient complaints.

5. Payments and Fees

For Patients: Payments for consultations are processed through secure third-party payment gateways. Refunds are subject to the cancellation policy.
For Doctors: Platform fees or commissions may be deducted from your earnings. Details will be shared upon registration.

6. Intellectual Property

All content on OrthoDirection, including logos, designs, text, and images, is the intellectual property of OrthoDirection. Users are not permitted to copy, reproduce, or distribute any content without prior written consent.

7. Privacy

Use of the platform is also governed by our Privacy Policy. By agreeing to these terms, you consent to the collection and use of your data as outlined in the Privacy Policy.

8. Disclaimers

OrthoDirection provides a platform for connecting patients and doctors but does not guarantee specific outcomes or services.
The platform does not endorse or validate the qualifications or expertise of any doctor listed.

9. Limitation of Liability

To the fullest extent permitted by law:
OrthoDirection is not liable for any damages arising from the use or inability to use the platform.
Users agree to indemnify OrthoDirection against claims resulting from their actions on the platform.

10. Termination

We reserve the right to suspend or terminate user accounts for violations of these terms or at our discretion, with or without notice.

11. Governing Law

These Terms & Conditions are governed by the laws of USA. Any disputes will be resolved under the exclusive jurisdiction of courts in USA.

12. Changes to Terms

OrthoDirection reserves the right to update these Terms & Conditions at any time. Continued use of the platform after changes indicates acceptance of the updated terms.
